Comothinr has, struck Way hcneath where any hoalinr Q?n possihly rca ch . rhei r triis t ours will shrivel and then choke. u\\% ^ 2C1 \n￼PRECAution Smile at everyone as if Most of them are moderately Benign., ______i-.Move into crowds On quiet feet. Keep your eyes Mobile, your ears alert. Know that there is always one Silent and behind you, who Stands where you are never Looking, in some alcove of your life And, choosing a runnel in the ribs, Slides in the knife. /' \n￼NOCTURNE Dismal as a toad's domed eye, a cloud Across the sundown's duck-egg blank Yellows at the edges; its mass Leans on itself, clambers, swells Over itself, layering up and up. Sleep threatens like a suffocation. Think of freedoms; feel wind, Smell bracken, listen to leaves. Lie under rattling aspens Or a clumped oak. But there, Stuck close to the trunk, An undiagnosed lump, secret From the light, hugs itself ready, Ready to lift open the stare Of a killing eye, and clack Rehearsing billhook mandibles For the inevitable sweet sunfall. It will launch out moth-like, shrieking. ^Jdfi^eSW idy * 31 \n￼''V MINOTAUR V>^-------^ It is there in the dark a blacker piece of the black I can see nothing no silhouette of horns no nostril no roll of eye-white I can hear the shift of weight the heavy rhythms.of breath I fancy the dull beat of a pulse I can hear the malevolence \u20224 - in the net of passages I have contrived for it secure as a lattice of thick bars secure as a pit the deeper shadow lurks and stirs youth is crunched there it swallows maidens and I Paed^aius of my craftsmanship have made its home, deep, central, as even its begetting I engineered P my skill it lives in, my life is equal to it, should it appear the shape would be unrecognisable as monstrous being too familiar ---------------- (Oj . \n￼/ 4 SCENARIO tOE I DREAM You are leading the raid. Among the neglected trees Surrounding the target house Your colleagues are posted, with dogs. Car tracks scar the shallow mud On the path to the path to the door Which opens without a key. You Climb the stairs, quietly, seeing The door at the top that you know is The door.| ------ - Movement behind it Stops your climb. You listen, Thumb on the safety-catch. And shout. Come out with your hands in the air, Slowly, one at a time. Now. Now you will know, really. \" Know. And you simultaneously Know that the gun is defective, probably 'Jammed, perhaps, paralysingly, A piece of wood. The squad in the shrubs was never There. You shout for the dogs And there comes no galloping bark. There is only you. Always there has only been you The one to come out of the door The one you have come here for The one who will walk out alone The one who has turned you to stone \n￼Is going to be, you know it, he too Ts going to be You. 4 The door handle dips and the gap Appears, widens and widens. 4 ^si ","docTitle":"","docDate":"2014-07-01 09:47:07.245"},"meta":{"contentType":"text/raw","emVer":"7.1.1103.5","langIdVer":"DefaultLangId","processingVer":"CalaisJob01","submissionDate":"2014-07-01 09:47:06.372","submitterCode":"57b17a53-6e34-87b0-20ff-a419896f49c9","signature":"digestalg-1|km6jI2Y2I511FUD9zExh2/whXmE=|Y/9KAFwpwRVDWK+ZQGALv1fdT5N/vKnsdtMPqa2xviYijNvUoOk7gg==","language":"English"}},"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/f5c78b45-68ae-313f-92c3-6f7662a96fe8/cat/1":{"_typeGroup":"topics","category":"http://d.opencalais.com/cat/Calais/HumanInterest","classifierName":"Calais","categoryName":"Human Interest","score":0.916},"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/f5c78b45-68ae-313f-92c3-6f7662a96fe8/cat/2":{"_typeGroup":"topics","category":"http://d.opencalais.com/cat/Calais/Hospitality_Recreation","classifierName":"Calais","categoryName":"Hospitality_Recreation","score":0.751},"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/f5c78b45-68ae-313f-92c3-6f7662a96fe8/lid/DefaultLangId":{"_typeGroup":"language","language":"http://d.opencalais.com/lid/DefaultLangId/English"},"http://d.opencalais.com/comphash-1/17499049-f971-353a-a7b8-e151e4f22bba":{"_typeGroup":"entities","_type":"Company","name":"Your","nationality":"N/A","resolutions":[{"id":"http://d.opencalais.com/er/company/ralg-tr1r/014b5ec1-4927-3e70-843e-dd3d56b532a6","score":1,"name":"YOUR COMMUNICATIONS GROUP LTD","shortname":"YOUR"}],"_typeReference":"http://s.opencalais.com/1/type/em/e/Company","instances":[{"detection":"[ the neglected trees Surrounding the target house ]Your[ colleagues are posted, with dogs.
